name: updatePhoneSettings
description:
Only [master account owners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) can use this API to enable BYOC(Bring your own carrier) option for a sub account.
**Scope**:
* `phone:master`
**Prerequisites**:
* Business or enterprise Account.

accountId.description: Unique identifier of the sub account.

enable.description: Set the value of this field to `true` to allow a sub account to add BYOC numbers from the Zoom web admin portal.
